comment: The police getting involved in this is wrong in so many ways, but bearing in mind Linehams general hatred of free speech and screams for Dankula to be jailed I'm thinking Karma got it right this time.
amr:
# ::snt The police getting involved in this is wrong in so many ways, but bearing in mind Linehams general hatred of free speech and screams for Dankula to be jailed I'm thinking Karma got it right this time.
(c / contrast-01
      :ARG1 (w / wrong-02
            :ARG1 (ii / involve-01
                  :ARG1 (p / police)
                  :ARG2 (t / this))
            :manner (w2 / way
                  :quant (m / many
                        :mod (s / so))))
      :ARG2 (t2 / think-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (r / right-06
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Karma"))
                  :ARG2 (ii3 / it)
                  :time (t3 / time
                        :mod (t4 / this)))
            :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (b / bear-in-mind-08
                        :ARG1 ii2
                        :ARG2 (a / and
                              :op1 (h / hate-01
                                    :ARG0 (p3 / person
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "Lineham"))
                                    :ARG1 (s2 / speak-01
                                          :ARG3-of (f / free-04))
                                    :ARG1-of (g / general-02))
                              :op2 (s3 / scream-01
                                    :ARG0 p3
                                    :ARG1 (j / jail-01
                                          :ARG1 (p4 / person
                                                :name (n3 / name
                                                      :op1 "Dankula")))))))))

comment: Lineham wants his free speech defended, but free speech must be denied to everyone else - eg. Count Dankula.
amr:
# ::snt Lineham wants his free speech defended, but free speech must be denied to everyone else - eg. Count Dankula.
(c / contrast-01
      :ARG1 (w / want-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Lineham"))
            :ARG1 (d / defend-01
                  :ARG1 (s / speak-01
                        :ARG1-of (f / free-04)
                        :poss p)))
      :ARG2 (o / obligate-01
            :ARG2 (d2 / deny-01
                  :ARG1 s
                  :ARG2 (e / everyone
                        :mod (e2 / else)
                        :example (p2 / person
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Dankula")
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG2 (c2 / Count)))))))

comment: Please be mindful of the words you are using. The usage of slurs reflects poorly on your character.
amr:
# ::snt Please be mindful of the words you are using. The usage of slurs reflects poorly on your character.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (m2 / mindful
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (w / word
                  :ARG1-of (u / use-01
                        :ARG0 y)))
      :snt2 (r / reflect-01
            :ARG1 (u2 / use-01
                  :ARG1 (s / slur))
            :ARG2 (c / character
                  :poss (y2 / you))
            :manner (p / poor)))
